events.message: I purchased a pair of shoes last week, but I want to request a refund because they don't fit properly and are uncomfortable.
The issue has been identified as a refund request related to product sizing and comfort concerns reported by the customer.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request for the shoes.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out about your order. I'm here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the shoes are unused and in their original packaging for us to proceed?
Sure, my order number is 563724, and the shoes are unused and still in the original box with all tags attached.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund as soon as you ship the product back. I will also send you a prepaid shipping label via email.
Thanks for your help! I appreciate the quick response and the prepaid label will make it easier for me to return the shoes.
We have received your returned shoes and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that the refund has been received and if you need any further assistance from us.
Since the refund has been completed and no further issues were reported, we are now closing your case. Thank you for contacting support!
